job.title: Data Scientist, Health Strategic Initiatives
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brHave you ever wanted to work on something that really matters  Is it important to you to help others live longer more fulfilling lives  The Health Strategic Initiatives team is focused on just that  enabling individuals to live a healthier happier life through personalized and compelling products  We are an experienced team of business leaders doctors designers PMs engineers and data scientists  We work in a collaborative and dynamic environment where we push ourselves to redefine the industry and create delightful user experiencesbrbrbrData is central to the success of our team  data insights drive feature development and design as well as defining future strategy and productsbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong br5 years as an analyst or data scientistbrbrExpertise working in Spark SQL Python or RbrbrStrong product data and analytics intuitionbrbrIntensely curious about data and love finding hidden relationships and patternsbrbrPassionate about health and wellnessbrbrStrong crossfunctional experience working with product business design and engineering teamsbrbrStrong interpersonal skillsbrbrProven experience boiling down technical approaches and complex findings into simple and compelling narratives that drive changebrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brAs a key member of the Health Strategic Initiatives team you will work cross functionally providing insights that drive feature innovation and development product personalization program and feature evaluation marketing insights and understanding customer behavior  You will have the opportunity to work with rich datasets to solve some of the most meaningful questions in health and wellnessbrbr brstrongEducation amp Experiencebrstrong brMasters PhD preferred in Computer Science Economics Engineering Mathematics Neuroscience Psychology Statistics or equivalent and 5 years of experiencebrbr brRole Number 200264842brbr
